And<S>2532</S> the fifth<S>3991</S> angel<S>32</S> sounded<S>4537</S>, and<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> a star<S>792</S> fall<S>4098</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S> unto<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>: and<S>2532</S> to him<S>846</S> was given<S>1325</S> the key<S>2807</S> of the bottomless<S>12</S> pit<S>5421</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he opened<S>455</S> the bottomless<S>12</S> pit<S>5421</S>; and<S>2532</S> there arose<S>305</S> a smoke<S>2586</S> out of<S>1537</S> the pit<S>5421</S>, as<S>5613</S> the smoke<S>2586</S> of a great<S>3173</S> furnace<S>2575</S>; and<S>2532</S> the sun<S>2246</S> and<S>2532</S> the air<S>109</S> were darkened<S>4654</S> by reason of<S>1537</S> the smoke<S>2586</S> of the pit<S>5421</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there came<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> the smoke<S>2586</S> locusts<S>200</S> upon<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>: and<S>2532</S> unto them<S>846</S> was given<S>1325</S> power<S>1849</S>, as<S>5613</S> the scorpions<S>4651</S> of the earth<S>1093</S> have<S>2192</S> power<S>1849</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it was commanded<S>4483</S> them<S>846</S> that<S>3363</S> they should<S>91</S> not<S>3363</S> hurt<S>91</S> the grass<S>5528</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, neither<S>3761</S> any<S>3956</S> green thing<S>5515</S>, neither<S>3761</S> any<S>3956</S> tree<S>1186</S>; but<S>1508</S> only<S>3441</S> those men<S>444</S> which<S>3748</S> have<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> the seal<S>4973</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> foreheads<S>3359</S>.
And<S>2532</S> to them<S>846</S> it was given<S>1325</S> that<S>3363</S> they should<S>615</S> not<S>3363</S> kill<S>615</S> them<S>846</S>, but<S>235</S> that<S>2443</S> they should be tormented<S>928</S> five<S>4002</S> months<S>3376</S>: and<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> torment<S>929</S> was as<S>5613</S> the torment<S>929</S> of a scorpion<S>4651</S>, when<S>3752</S> he striketh<S>3817</S> a man<S>444</S>.
And<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S> shall men<S>444</S> seek<S>2212</S> death<S>2288</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall<S>2147</S> not<S>3756</S> find<S>2147</S> it<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> shall desire<S>1937</S> to die<S>599</S>, and<S>2532</S> death<S>2288</S> shall flee<S>5343</S> from<S>575</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the shapes<S>3667</S> of the locusts<S>200</S> were like<S>3664</S> unto horses<S>2462</S> prepared<S>2090</S> unto<S>1519</S> battle<S>4171</S>; and<S>2532</S> on<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> heads<S>2776</S> were as it were<S>5613</S> crowns<S>4735</S> like<S>3664</S> gold<S>5557</S>, and<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> faces<S>4383</S> were as<S>5613</S> the faces<S>4383</S> of men<S>444</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they had<S>2192</S> hair<S>2359</S> as<S>5613</S> the hair<S>2359</S> of women<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> teeth<S>3599</S> were<S>2258</S> as<S>5613</S> the teeth of lions<S>3023</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they had<S>2192</S> breastplates<S>2382</S>, as it were<S>5613</S> breastplates<S>2382</S> of iron<S>4603</S>; and<S>2532</S> the sound<S>5456</S> of their<S>846</S> wings<S>4420</S> was as<S>5613</S> the sound<S>5456</S> of chariots<S>716</S> of many<S>4183</S> horses<S>2462</S> running<S>5143</S> to<S>1519</S> battle<S>4171</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they had<S>2192</S> tails<S>3769</S> like<S>3664</S> unto scorpions<S>4651</S>, and<S>2532</S> there were<S>2258</S> stings<S>2759</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> tails<S>3769</S>: and<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> power<S>1849</S> was to hurt<S>91</S> men<S>444</S> five<S>4002</S> months<S>3376</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they had<S>2192</S> a king<S>935</S> over<S>1909</S> them<S>848</S>, which is the angel<S>32</S> of the bottomless pit<S>12</S>, whose<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> in the Hebrew tongue<S>1447</S> is Abaddon<S>3</S>, but<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the Greek tongue<S>1673</S> hath<S>2192</S> his name<S>3686</S> Apollyon<S>623</S>. <sup>Apollyon: that is to say, A destroyer</sup>
One<S>3391</S> woe<S>3759</S> is past<S>565</S>; and, behold<S>2400</S>, there come<S>2064</S> two<S>1417</S> woes<S>3759</S> more<S>2089</S> hereafter<S>3326</S> <S>5023</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the sixth<S>1623</S> angel<S>32</S> sounded<S>4537</S>, and<S>2532</S> I heard<S>191</S> a<S>3391</S> voice<S>5456</S> from<S>1537</S> the four<S>5064</S> horns<S>2768</S> of the golden<S>5552</S> altar<S>2379</S> which<S>3588</S> is before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S> to the sixth<S>1623</S> angel<S>32</S> which<S>3739</S> had<S>2192</S> the trumpet<S>4536</S>, Loose<S>3089</S> the four<S>5064</S> angels<S>32</S> which<S>3588</S> are bound<S>1210</S> in<S>1909</S> the great<S>3173</S> river<S>4215</S> Euphrates<S>2166</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the four<S>5064</S> angels<S>32</S> were loosed<S>3089</S>, which<S>3588</S> were prepared<S>2090</S> for<S>1519</S> an hour<S>5610</S>, and<S>2532</S> a day<S>2250</S>, and<S>2532</S> a month<S>3376</S>, and<S>2532</S> a year<S>1763</S>, for to<S>2443</S> slay<S>615</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of men<S>444</S>. <sup>for an hour: or, at an hour</sup>
And<S>2532</S> the number<S>706</S> of the army<S>4753</S> of the horsemen<S>2461</S> were two hundred<S>1417</S> thousand<S>3461</S> thousand<S>3461</S>: and<S>2532</S> I heard<S>191</S> the number<S>706</S> of them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> thus<S>3779</S> I saw<S>1492</S> the horses<S>2462</S> in<S>1722</S> the vision<S>3706</S>, and<S>2532</S> them that sat<S>2521</S> on<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>, having<S>2192</S> breastplates<S>2382</S> of fire<S>4447</S>, and<S>2532</S> of jacinth<S>5191</S>, and<S>2532</S> brimstone<S>2306</S>: and<S>2532</S> the heads<S>2776</S> of the horses<S>2462</S> were as<S>5613</S> the heads<S>2776</S> of lions<S>3023</S>; and<S>2532</S> out of<S>1537</S> their<S>846</S> mouths<S>4750</S> issued<S>1607</S> fire<S>4442</S> and<S>2532</S> smoke<S>2586</S> and<S>2532</S> brimstone<S>2303</S>.
By<S>5259</S> these<S>5130</S> three<S>5140</S> was<S>615</S> the third part<S>5154</S> of men<S>444</S> killed<S>615</S>, by<S>1537</S> the fire<S>4442</S>, and<S>2532</S> by<S>1537</S> the smoke<S>2586</S>, and<S>2532</S> by<S>1537</S> the brimstone<S>2303</S>, which<S>3588</S> issued<S>1607</S> out of<S>1537</S> their<S>846</S> mouths<S>4750</S>.
For<S>1063</S> their<S>846</S> power<S>1849</S> is<S>1526</S> <S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> tails<S>3769</S>: for<S>1063</S> their<S>846</S> tails<S>3769</S> were like<S>3664</S> unto serpents<S>3789</S>, and had<S>2192</S> heads<S>2776</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S> they do hurt<S>91</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the rest<S>3062</S> of the men<S>444</S> which<S>3739</S> were<S>615</S> not<S>3756</S> killed<S>615</S> by<S>1722</S> these<S>5025</S> plagues<S>4127</S> yet<S>3777</S> repented<S>3340</S> not<S>3777</S> of<S>1537</S> the works<S>2041</S> of their<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S>, that<S>3363</S> they should<S>4352</S> not<S>3363</S> worship<S>4352</S> devils<S>1140</S>, and<S>2532</S> idols<S>1497</S> of gold<S>5552</S>, and<S>2532</S> silver<S>693</S>, and<S>2532</S> brass<S>5470</S>, and<S>2532</S> stone<S>3035</S>, and<S>2532</S> of wood<S>3585</S>: which<S>3739</S> neither<S>3777</S> can<S>1410</S> see<S>991</S>, nor<S>3777</S> hear<S>191</S>, nor<S>3777</S> walk<S>4043</S>:
Neither<S>2532</S> <S>3756</S> repented they<S>3340</S> of<S>1537</S> their<S>846</S> murders<S>5408</S>, nor<S>3777</S> of<S>1537</S> their<S>846</S> sorceries<S>5331</S>, nor<S>3777</S> of<S>1537</S> their<S>846</S> fornication<S>4202</S>, nor<S>3777</S> of<S>1537</S> their<S>846</S> thefts<S>2809</S>.
